projects.title: How to build a drone controlled by an android smartphone
projects.description: Basics of Turning your Remote Controll Vehicle into an Autonomous System (Drone) Using an Arduino.Experience using an arduino is highly recommended! So without further ado, lets get started!

topics.name: Java  (programming language)
topics.description: Java is a computer programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented, and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

topics.name: Scala (programming language)
topics.description: An object-functional programming and scripting language for general software applications, statically typed, designed to concisely express solutions in an elegant,type-safe and lightweight (low ceremonial) manner.

topics.name: Algorithm
topics.description: A step-by-step procedure for calculations. Algorithms are used for calculation, data processing, and automated reasoning.
